<br>
I presented this talk at the 2021 Entomological Society of America (ESA) Annual Meeting in Denver, CO. The presentation focused on how two native braconid parasitoids utilize wheat stem sawfly larvae in both winter wheat and smooth brome, highlighting the role of non-crop habitats in biological control.
